channel.title: Uncomfortable Conversations with Josh Szeps
channel.itunes:subtitle: The safe space for dangerous ideas.
channel.itunes:author: Josh Szeps
channel.itunes:summary: The world has never been more connected. Yet never more divided. We yell at each other from inside our echo chambers. But change doesn't happen inside an echo chamber. It's time to get out, to stretch our legs, to step on some land mines. It's time to have an uncomfortable conversation with Josh Szeps.
channel.description: The world has never been more connected. Yet never more divided. We yell at each other from inside our echo chambers. But change doesn’t happen inside an echo chamber. It’s time to get out, to stretch our legs, to step on some land mines. It's time to have an uncomfortable conversation with Josh Szeps.

item.title: "The Madness Of Fame" with Osher Günsberg
item.itunes:author: Josh Szeps
item.itunes:summary: Osher is Australia's biggest TV star and the host of Australian Idol, The Bachelor, The Bachelorette and The Masked Singer. He opens up to Josh about the pitfalls of mental illness, rockstar lifestyles, alcohol addiction, fame... and 9/11.
item.description: Osher is Australia's biggest TV star and the host of Australian Idol, The Bachelor, The Bachelorette and The Masked Singer. He opens up to Josh about the pitfalls of mental illness, rockstar lifestyles, alcohol addiction, fame... and 9/11.

item.title: "Are You Awake?" with Sam Harris
item.itunes:author: Josh Szeps
item.itunes:summary: Sam Harris is a neuroscientist, philosopher and New York Times best-selling author. He and Josh wrestle with what it means to be self-aware.
item.description: Sam Harris is a neuroscientist, philosopher and New York Times best-selling author. He and Josh wrestle with what it means to be self-aware.
